color.info: Which property to use for the color

select.info: Define a variable that stores the selection of this list.

multiSelect.info: Whether to allow multiple entities to be selected.

showTitle.info: Whether to show the title bar.

showDeleteButton.info: Whether to show a button to a delete interface.

showEditbutton.info: Whether to show a button to a edit interface.

onDone.info: Action to execute on done (show done button)
